attributes.action: Support for UK MPs to vote on EU membership based on what's best for Britain
attributes.additional_details:
Please consider what would that 52% have been reduced to if they hadn't waited till after the referendum before they said they weren't going to reduce immigration.  

What would that 52% have gone down to if they were honest about the likely impact on our economy.

What would that 52% have gone down to if they were honest about the "£350 million" to "save our NHS" which vanished on the first interview after victory had been declared.

We should have the courage to overrule a result based on lies
attributes.background:
To show support for MPs to do what they are elected to do, which is to act in the best interest of their constituents.  

If that means overruling the narrow brexit referendum result we should support them to do so, that is true leadership.
